Bioconductor is a member of [The Carpentries](https://carpentries.org/), a global community focused on teaching foundational coding and data science skills. Our membership supports the development of Bioconductor-specific training materials and enables our certified instructors to teach Carpentry workshops at Bioconductor events and beyond.

For more information, you can:

-   Visit our [Instructors](instructors.qmd) and [Workshops](workshops.qmd) pages for current details.
-   Explore the [blog post](https://blog.bioconductor.org/posts/2022-07-12-carpentries-membership/) that outlines Bioconductorâ€™s Carpentries membership or browse other [Carpentries-related posts](https://blog.bioconductor.org/index.html#category=Carpentries).
